name: Laura Marina Perez Cassiraga
cvDescription: Recent Sworn Translation graduate with two years of experience teaching English and Spanish. Skilled in writing and proofreading. Currently studying Frontend Web Development and interested in participating in projects where I can put my language and IT skills to the test. Lover of books, cats, and all things language.
